column4: if i installed ubuntu in english what is the best way to install it another language ?
well that app aint in the menu
it definitly should be you sure, System > Administration > Language Support
i have done an install according to the fakeraidhowto with my own settings ofcourse but several apps are missing from the menu the apps is installed but i can access them from the menu
like synaptics users and groups and so on
understood what language do you wnat?
i have installed the language-pack-sv packages
so what do you want then, the languages are installed?
yeah but it aint applied on the login screen and almost all the app links in admin menu is gone
